from django.db import models
from django.utils import timezone
import uuid
import datetime
from django.core.validators import MinValueValidator
from django.contrib.postgres.fields import ArrayField




[docs]
class AppUserManager(models.Manager):


[docs]
    def create_user(self, phone, **extra_fields):
        """
        Create and save an app user with the given phone number.
        """
        if not phone:
            raise ValueError("Users must have a phone number.")
        extra_fields.setdefault("is_phone_verified", False)
        user = self.model(phone=phone, **extra_fields)
        user.save(using=self._db)
        return user








[docs]
class AppUser(models.Model):
    phone = models.CharField(
        max_length=15,
        unique=True,
        help_text="Format: +11234567890"
    )
    name = models.CharField(
        max_length=255,
        help_text="User's full name."
    )
    otp_code = models.CharField(
        max_length=6,
        blank=True,
        null=True,
        help_text="Latest OTP code sent to the user."
    )
    otp_created_at = models.DateTimeField(
        blank=True,
        null=True,
        help_text="Timestamp when the OTP was generated."
    )
    is_phone_verified = models.BooleanField(
        default=False,
        help_text="Indicates whether the user has verified their phone number."
    )
    date_joined = models.DateTimeField(default=timezone.now)

    objects = AppUserManager()

    def __str__(self):
        return f"{self.name} ({self.phone})"



[docs]
    def set_otp(self, otp):
        """
        Set a new OTP code and update the OTP creation timestamp.
        """
        self.otp_code = otp
        self.otp_created_at = timezone.now()
        self.save(update_fields=["otp_code", "otp_created_at"])





[docs]
    def is_otp_valid(self, otp, expiry=300):
        """
        Validate the OTP:
          - Checks whether the provided otp matches the saved otp_code.
          - Checks that the OTP was generated within the expiry period (default 300 seconds / 5 minutes).
        """
        if not self.otp_code or self.otp_code != otp:
            return False
        if not self.otp_created_at:
            return False
        time_diff = (timezone.now() - self.otp_created_at).total_seconds()
        return time_diff <= expiry








[docs]
class AppUserInfo(models.Model):
    user = models.OneToOneField(
        AppUser,
        on_delete=models.CASCADE,
        related_name="info",
        help_text="The AppUser associated with this extra info."
    )
    height = models.FloatField(help_text="Height in inches.")
    birthday = models.DateField(help_text="Birthday of the user.")
    weight = models.FloatField(help_text="Weight in pounds.")
    
    SEX_CHOICES = (
        ('M', 'Male'),
        ('F', 'Female'),
        ('O', 'Other')
    )
    sex = models.CharField(
        max_length=1,
        choices=SEX_CHOICES,
        help_text="Sex of the user."
    )

    def __str__(self):
        return f"Info for {self.user.name} ({self.user.phone})"






[docs]
class Activity(models.Model):
    id = models.UUIDField(primary_key=True, default=uuid.uuid4, editable=False)
    name = models.CharField(max_length=255, db_index=True)
    description = models.TextField()
    pointValue = models.IntegerField(db_index=True)
    
    associated_workout = models.ForeignKey(
        'Workout',
        null=True,
        blank=True,
        on_delete=models.SET_NULL,
        related_name='activities',
        verbose_name='Associated Workout'
    )

    def __str__(self):
        return f"{self.name} "

    class Meta:
        ordering = ['name']
        verbose_name_plural = "Activities"






[docs]
class ActivityPlan(models.Model):
    id = models.UUIDField(primary_key=True, default=uuid.uuid4, editable=False)
    name = models.CharField(null=True, blank=True, default="Unnamed", max_length=255, help_text="Name of the activity plan.")
    monday_activities = models.ManyToManyField(Activity, related_name='monday_activities')
    tuesday_activities = models.ManyToManyField(Activity, related_name='tuesday_activities')
    wednesday_activities = models.ManyToManyField(Activity, related_name='wednesday_activities')
    thursday_activities = models.ManyToManyField(Activity, related_name='thursday_activities')
    friday_activities = models.ManyToManyField(Activity, related_name='friday_activities')
    saturday_activities = models.ManyToManyField(Activity, related_name='saturday_activities')
    sunday_activities = models.ManyToManyField(Activity, related_name='sunday_activities')

    def __str__(self):  
        return self.name






[docs]
class Exercise(models.Model):
    id = models.UUIDField(primary_key=True, default=uuid.uuid4, editable=False)   
    name = models.CharField(max_length=255)
    force = models.CharField(max_length=100, null=True, blank=True)
    level = models.CharField(max_length=100)    
    mechanic = models.CharField(max_length=100, null=True, blank=True)
    equipment = models.CharField(max_length=100, blank=True, default='None')
    primary_muscles = models.JSONField()
    secondary_muscles = models.JSONField()
    instructions = models.JSONField()
    category = models.CharField(max_length=100)
    picture1 = models.ImageField(upload_to='exercises/', blank=True, null=True)
    picture2 = models.ImageField(upload_to='exercises/', blank=True, null=True)
    point_value = models.IntegerField(default=0)

    def __str__(self):  
        return self.name

    class Meta:
        ordering = ['name']






[docs]
class Workout(models.Model):
    id = models.UUIDField(primary_key=True, default=uuid.uuid4, editable=False)
    name = models.CharField(max_length=200)
    description = models.TextField(blank=True)
    duration = models.DurationField(blank=True, default=datetime.timedelta(0))
    created_at = models.DateTimeField(auto_now_add=True)
    updated_at = models.DateTimeField(auto_now=True)
    exercises = models.ManyToManyField(Exercise, through='WorkoutExercise')

    def __str__(self):
        return self.name

    class Meta:
        ordering = ['-created_at', 'name']






[docs]
class WorkoutExercise(models.Model):
    id = models.UUIDField(primary_key=True, default=uuid.uuid4, editable=False)
    workout = models.ForeignKey(Workout, on_delete=models.CASCADE)
    exercise = models.ForeignKey(Exercise, on_delete=models.CASCADE)
    sets = models.PositiveIntegerField(null=True, blank=True, validators=[MinValueValidator(1)])
    reps = models.PositiveIntegerField(null=True, blank=True, validators=[MinValueValidator(1)])
    weight = models.PositiveIntegerField(null=True, blank=True, validators=[MinValueValidator(0)])
    equipment = models.CharField(max_length=100, blank=True, null=True)
    order = models.PositiveIntegerField()
    time = models.DurationField(null=True, blank=True)

    class Meta:
        ordering = ['order']

    def __str__(self):
        return f"{self.workout.name} - {self.exercise.name}"






[docs]
class AppUserCurrentActivityPlan(models.Model):
    """
    This model represents the currently assigned ActivityPlan for a given AppUser.
    A user may have at most one current activity plan.
    """
    user = models.OneToOneField(AppUser, on_delete=models.CASCADE, related_name='current_activity_plan')
    activity_plan = models.ForeignKey(ActivityPlan, on_delete=models.CASCADE, related_name='current_assignments')
    isComplete = models.BooleanField(default=False, db_index=True)
    dateCompleted = models.DateTimeField(null=True, blank=True, db_index=True)

    def __str__(self):
        return f"Current Plan for {self.user.phone}: {self.activity_plan.id}"






[docs]
class AppUserActivityPlanHistory(models.Model):
    """
    This model stores the history of all ActivityPlans that a given user has completed.
    The 'completed_activity_plans' field holds an array (ManyToMany) of ActivityPlans.
    """
    user = models.OneToOneField(AppUser, on_delete=models.CASCADE, related_name='activity_plan_history')
    completed_activity_plans = models.ManyToManyField(ActivityPlan, blank=True, related_name='completed_assignments')

    def __str__(self):
        return f"History for {self.user.phone}"






[docs]
class AppUserGoals(models.Model):
    user = models.OneToOneField(
        AppUser,
        on_delete=models.CASCADE,
        related_name="goals",
        help_text="The AppUser associated with these goals."
    )
    goals_raw = ArrayField(
        models.CharField(max_length=255),
        blank=True,
        default=list,
        help_text="A list of raw goal strings."
    )
    
    GOALS_PROCESSED_CHOICES = (
        ('lose_weight', 'Lose Weight'),
        ('gain_muscle', 'Gain Muscle'),
        ('improve_endurance', 'Improve Endurance'),
        ('increase_flexibility', 'Increase Flexibility'),
    )

    # figure out all variables of a person's wellbeing that we can modulate; the AI must infer for each which to increase and which to decrease
    # the user gives their goals in natural language in goals_raw; the job of Max is to infer a discrete model of these goals in terms of a
    # linear combination of the variables defined in GOALS_PROCESSED_CHOICES
    
    goals_processed = ArrayField(
        models.CharField(max_length=50, choices=GOALS_PROCESSED_CHOICES),
        blank=True,
        default=list,
        help_text="A list of processed goals, restricted to allowed choices."
    )

    def __str__(self):
        return f"Goals for {self.user.phone}"






[docs]
class Affiliate(models.Model):
    """
    Represents a partner brand in the affiliate program.

    Attributes:
        id (UUIDField): Unique identifier for the affiliate
        name (str): Name of the partner brand
        contact_email (str): Primary contact email for the affiliate
        contact_phone (str): Contact phone number (optional)
        website (str): Website URL for the affiliate (optional)
        date_joined (datetime): When the affiliate joined the program
        is_active (bool): Whether the affiliate is currently active
    """
    id = models.UUIDField(primary_key=True, default=uuid.uuid4, editable=False)
    name = models.CharField(max_length=255, unique=True, help_text="Name of the partner brand.")
    contact_email = models.EmailField(unique=True, help_text="Primary contact email for the affiliate.")
    contact_phone = models.CharField(max_length=15, blank=True, null=True, help_text="Contact phone number.")
    website = models.URLField(blank=True, null=True, help_text="Website URL for the affiliate.")
    date_joined = models.DateTimeField(default=timezone.now)
    is_active = models.BooleanField(default=True, help_text="Indicates if the affiliate is active.")

    def __str__(self):
        """
        Returns a string representation of the affiliate.

        Returns:
            str: The affiliate's name
        """
        return self.name


    


[docs]
class AffiliatePromotion(models.Model):
    id = models.UUIDField(primary_key=True, default=uuid.uuid4, editable=False)
    affiliate = models.OneToOneField(Affiliate, on_delete=models.CASCADE, related_name='promotion')
    title = models.CharField(max_length=255, help_text="Title of the promotion. (i.e. Free Salad)")
    description = models.TextField(help_text="Description of the deal/promotion being offered.")
    max_uses = models.PositiveIntegerField(default=100, help_text="Maximum number of times this code can be claimed.")
    uses_remaining = models.PositiveIntegerField(default=100, help_text="Remaining number of uses.")
    start_date = models.DateTimeField(help_text="Start date of the promotion.")
    end_date = models.DateTimeField(help_text="End date of the promotion.")
    is_active = models.BooleanField(default=True, help_text="Indicates if the promotion is currently active.")

    def __str__(self):
        return f"{self.title} by {self.affiliate.name}"


    


[docs]
class AffiliatePromotionDiscountCode(models.Model):
    id = models.UUIDField(primary_key=True, default=uuid.uuid4, editable=False)
    code = models.CharField(max_length=20, unique=True, help_text="Unique discount code for users.")
    affiliate_promotion = models.OneToOneField(AffiliatePromotion, on_delete=models.CASCADE, related_name='affiliate_promotion')
    is_used = models.BooleanField(default=False, help_text="Indicates if the discount code has been used.")

    def __str__(self):
        return f"{self.code} for {self.affiliate_promotion.title}"





[docs]
class AffiliatePromotionRedemption(models.Model):
    id = models.UUIDField(primary_key=True, default=uuid.uuid4, editable=False)
    promotion = models.ForeignKey(AffiliatePromotion, on_delete=models.CASCADE, related_name='redemptions')
    user = models.ForeignKey(AppUser, on_delete=models.CASCADE, related_name='claimed_promotions')#Links Redemption to specific User who claimed promotion
    redeemed_at = models.DateTimeField(auto_now_add=True, help_text="Timestamp of when the promotion was redeemed.")

    class Meta:
        unique_together = ('promotion', 'user')  #Each user can only claim the promo once.

    def __str__(self):
        return f"{self.user.phone} claimed {self.promotion.title}"
